current.name: Christel 7-piece personal care kit
current.metaTitle: Promotional Christel 7-piece personal care kit | National Pen IE
current.description: Christel 7-piece personal care kit.Make sure you always look your best. This set includes a mirror, tweezers, a nail clipper, a toe nail clipper, a pair of scissors, a nail file and a cuticle tool. The set comes in a handy nylon pouch.Microfibre nylon.
